item.title: [Resolved] ci.athion.net is offline
item.description: [Final message] The incident has been resolved. Jenkins operates as intended again. [Initial message] We are aware, that our Jenkins server is currently not accessible, we’re investigating. In the meantime, you can download FAWE from modrinth: https://modrinth.com/plugin/fastasyncworldedit PlotSquared, its addons and FAVS are not affected by this outage. If you need to access something else build on Jenkins, please let us know.
item.content:
[Final message]

The incident has been resolved. Jenkins operates as intended again.

[Initial message]
We are aware, that our Jenkins server is currently not accessible, we’re investigating.
In the meantime, you can download FAWE from modrinth: https://modrinth.com/plugin/fastasyncworldedit
PlotSquared, its addons and FAVS are not affected by this outage.

If you need to access something else build on Jenkins, please let us know.

item.title: [Resolved] Maintenance Window for Kubernetes
item.description: [Final Message] The maintenance is has been completed without issue. [Initial Message] Sheriff may be unavailable to proceed modmails or respond in DMs during this maintenance window.
item.content:
[Final Message] The maintenance is has been completed without issue.

[Initial Message] Sheriff may be unavailable to proceed modmails or respond in DMs during this maintenance window.

item.title: [Resolved] ci.athion.net is down
item.description: [Final Message] The issue has been identified and a fix has been delivered. [Initial Message] Our Jenkins instance is currently offline, we’re investigating. In the meantime, you can download a .zip file from GitHub actions of the project you wanted to download from Jenkins.
item.content:
[Final Message] The issue has been identified and a fix has been delivered.

[Initial Message] Our Jenkins instance is currently offline, we’re investigating.
In the meantime, you can download a .zip file from GitHub actions of the project you wanted to download from Jenkins.
